FactorGasAggregator.mainSelect: SELECT C.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr, --0 C.CPOD, --1 a.operando, --2 to_char(c.d_valido_dal,'yyyymmdd'), --3 to_char(c.d_valido_al,'yyyymmdd'), valori, --5 '',--NVL(prezzo,0) , --6 b.id_operando --7 FROM GAS_prodotto_operando a, GAS_anagrafica_operandi b, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrgas C, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d WHERE c.ctar1=a.ctar1 AND C.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr IN ( SELECT CNCON FROM Z_test_contratti) AND a.operando = b.operando AND a.operando != 'GFCORR1590' AND tipo = 'FACTOR' AND c.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr=d.dbi_punto_key AND valori IS NOT NULL GROUP BY C.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr, --0 C.CPOD, --1 a.operando, --2 to_char(c.d_valido_dal,'yyyymmdd'), --3 to_char(c.d_valido_al,'yyyymmdd'), valori, --5 '',--NVL(prezzo,0) , --6 b.id_operando --7 UNION ALL SELECT C.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr, --0 C.CPOD, --1 b.operando, --2 TO_CHAR(d.valid_from,'yyyymmdd'),--3 TO_CHAR(d.valid_until,'yyyymmdd'), --4 DECIMALI_FACT6(NVL(coefficente_c, '1,000000'),'6'), --5 '' , --6 b.id_operando --7 FROM GAS_anagrafica_operandi b, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrgas C, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura d WHERE C.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr IN ( SELECT CNCON FROM Z_test_contratti) AND b.operando = 'GFCORR1590' AND tipo = 'FACTOR' AND c.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr=d.dbi_punto_key GROUP BY C.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr, C.CPOD, b.operando, TO_CHAR(d.valid_from,'yyyymmdd'),--3 TO_CHAR(d.valid_until,'yyyymmdd'), --4 '', b.id_operando, NVL(coefficente_c, '1') ORDER BY operando

FactorGasExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT GAS_FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 GAS_FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 GAS_FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 GAS_FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 GAS_facts_f_factor.legacy, --4 GAS_facts_f_factor.tipo, --5 GAS_facts_f_factor.operand, --6 GAS_facts_f_factor.saison, --7 GAS_facts_f_factor.prog, --8 GAS_facts_v_factor.legacy, --9 GAS_facts_v_factor.tipo, --10 GAS_facts_v_factor.ab, --11 GAS_facts_v_factor.bis, --12 GAS_facts_v_factor.factor, --13 GAS_facts_v_factor.tarifart, --14 GAS_facts_v_factor.kondigr, --15 GAS_facts_v_factor.prog --16 from GAS_facts_key,GAS_facts_f_factor,GAS_facts_v_factor where GAS_facts_key.legacy = GAS_facts_f_factor.legacy and GAS_facts_v_factor.legacy=GAS_facts_key.legacy and GAS_facts_f_factor.legacy=GAS_facts_v_factor.legacy and GAS_facts_f_factor.prog=GAS_facts_v_factor.prog order by GAS_facts_f_factor.prog

UDEFGasAggregator.mainSelect: select v.cncon, --0 v.CPOD, --1 a.operando, --2 to_char(v.d_valido_dal,'yyyymmdd'), --3 to_char(v.d_valido_al,'yyyymmdd'), --4 b.id_operando , --5 CASE WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'ACQUA CALDA' THEN 'C2' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'ACQUA CALDA / PRODUZIONE' THEN 'C2' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'COTTURA' THEN 'C2' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'COTTURA / ACQUA CALDA' THEN 'C2' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'COTTURA / PRODUZIONE' THEN 'C2' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'PRODUZIONE' THEN 'C2' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'RISCALDAMENTO' THEN 'C2' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'RISCALDAMENTO / ACQUA CALDA' THEN 'C2' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'RISCALDAMENTO / ACQUA CALDA / PRODUZIONE' THEN 'C2' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'RISCALDAMENTO / COTTURA' THEN 'C2' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'RISCALDAMENTO / COTTURA / ACQUA CALDA' THEN 'C3' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'RISCALDAMENTO / COTTURA / ACQUA CALDA / PRODUZIONE' THEN 'C2' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'RISCALDAMENTO / COTTURA / PRODUZIONE' THEN 'C2' WHEN DESC_DEST_USO = 'RISCALDAMENTO / PRODUZIONE' THEN 'C2' ELSE 'C2' END AS valore from DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrgas v, gas_prodotto_operando a, gas_anagrafica_operandi b, DBI_USER.ifc_sap_punti_fornitura D where a.ctar1=v.ctar1 and v.cncon IN (SELECT CNCON FROM z_test_contratti) and a.operando = b.operando and d.dbi_punto_key=v.cncon and tipo = 'USERDEF' order by v.cncon

UDEFGasExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT GAS_FACTS_KEY.LEGACY, --0 GAS_FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 GAS_FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 GAS_FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY, --4 GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.TIPO, --5 GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.OPERAND, --6 GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.SAISON,--7 GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.PROG, --8 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.LEGACY, --9 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.TIPO,--10 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.AB, --11 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.BIS, --12 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL1, --13 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL2,--14 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL3,--15 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.UDEFVAL4,--16 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.TARIFART, --17 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.KONDGIR, --18 GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.PROG --19 FROM GAS_FACTS_KEY,GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF,GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF WHERE GAS_FACTS_KEY.LEGACY = GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY AND GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.LEGACY = GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.LEGACY and GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.PROG = GAS_FACTS_V_UDEF.PROG order by GAS_FACTS_F_UDEF.prog
